name: Dolgrim
book: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

traits.Dual Consciousness: The dolgrim has advantage on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, and knocked unconscious.

actions.Morningstar: Melee Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.Spear: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.
actions.Hand Crossbow: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
